SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Add read action, URL and skip SSL validation to java arguments : SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_AC_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AC_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! base URL : SET &UC4RB_AC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_AC_BASE_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AC_CMD#, " -baseurl &UC4RB_AC_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! API Token : IF &UC4RB_AC_TOKEN# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AC_CMD#, " -basicauth NO") : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AC_TOKEN#" : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AC_CMD#, " -basicauth YES")
! Username and password : SET &UC4RB_AC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_AC_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AC_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_AC_ESCAPED_STRING#") : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AC_PASSWORD#" : ENDIF
! Access key is decrypted : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "UNIX" export UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_AC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AC_CMD#, " -ssl &UC4RB_AC_SSL_VALIDATION#")
! Load package parameters : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used add arguments which are common for all actions.This along with action specific arguments are passed to the java command while calling the Service Virtualization tool jar. It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
